text:
Singapore Vikings FC is an expatriate football club based in Singapore. The players are mainly made up of Danish players, mostly having played in professional, semi-professional or amateur division football in their native country. The Vikings are also well known for their aim to run 1000km in order to raise $20,000 for migrant workers in Singapore during the Covid-19 period.
References.
[https://www.straitstimes.com/sport/football/football-singapore-vikings-aim-to-run-1000km-to-raise-20000-for-migrant-workers, Football: Singapore Vikings aim to run 1,000km to raise $20,000 for migrant workers]
